title: Master's Thesis: Coherence Reduction in Sparse Modeling
description: Developed novel methodologies for coherence reduction in sparse signal recovery problems. Investigated applications of Hadamard transforms in improving reconstruction accuracy.

title: Matrix Estimation Through Matrix-Vector-Multiplication
description: Working on matrix estimation techniques using efficient computational approaches as part of IISc-ICASSP Fellowship.

title: Text Summarization Project
description: Developed sequence-to-sequence models with attention mechanisms for automatic text summarization. Implemented and compared PEGASUS, BART, GPT-2, and T5 models on CNN/DailyMail and Samsung datasets.

title: Phoenix Skyways Airline Passenger Analysis
description: Analyzed factors influencing passenger satisfaction using survey data and flight information. Developed predictive models to classify passenger satisfaction levels and provided strategic recommendations.

title: IPL Insights (2008-22)
description: Designed comprehensive database system for IPL cricket data with CSV preprocessing. Developed interactive dashboard with role-based access and data visualization tools for strategic team management insights.

title: Heart Attack Risk Prediction
description: Implemented machine learning classification models for cardiovascular risk assessment. Predicted heart attack risk using health and lifestyle factors through data cleanup, exploration, and machine learning.

title: Primality Testing in Cryptography
description: Conducted theoretical analysis of deterministic and probabilistic primality testing algorithms including Miller-Rabin and AKS. Investigated computational complexity trade-offs and security implications in RSA cryptographic implementations.

publications.title: Paper: Coherence Reduction Techniques in Sparse Modeling
publications.note: Target: IEEE Transactions on Signal Processing
